channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NJ
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NJ

item.title: Report X-2023061670
item.description:
Report X-2023061670

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-25
  • City: TRENTON
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2023061670 SequenceEvent: Shipping box torn while in transit causing Rapicide PA Part B 5L jug to have loose cap. Package was immediately placed in RED Tote upon discovery and brought to HAZMAT cage for further processing. DescribePack: Shipping box torn while in transit causing Rapicide PA Part B 5L jug to have loose cap. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was immediately placed in RED Tote upon discovery and brought to HAZMAT cage for further processing. 2.   • Description: SequenceEvent: Contents shifted in shipping box causing Immonucal Formic Acid Bone Decalcifier 1Gal jug to have bad cap seal. Package was immediately placed in a RED Tote upon discovery and brought to HAZMAT cage for further processing. DescribePack: Contents shifted in shipping box causing Immonucal Formic Acid Bone Decalcifier 1Gal jug to have bad cap seal. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was immediately placed in a RED Tote upon discovery and brought to HAZMAT cage for further processing.

item.title: Report X-2023061664
item.description:
Report X-2023061664

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-25T15:12:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-24
  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: DURING THE OVERNIGHT SORT THE PACKAGE WAS BROUGHT TO THE HAZMAT CAGE SHOWING OBVIOUS SIGN OF LEAKAGE. UPON FURTHER INSPECTION THE BOX CONTAINING ECBOLAB LIME AWAY ( NITRIC ACID SOLUTION) WAS FOUND WITH ONE OF THE BOTTLES HALF LEAKED OUT. THEY WERE HURRIEDLY PLACED IN A SALVAGE TO BE RETURNED TO SHIPPER UNLESS OTHERWISE. DescribePack: FAILURE OF THE PACKAGE WAS DUE TO A CAP BEING LOOSE OFF ONE OF THE BOTTLES. 1 OF THE BOTTLE OF ECOLAB LIME AWAY WAS HALF WAY LEAKED OUT. DurationRel: 4 and MitigateEffect: THE BOTTLES WERE TIGHTEN AND PLACED INTO A LINED SALVAGE DRUM TO AWAIT DISPOSITION

item.title: Report X-2023061501
item.description:
Report X-2023061501

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-20T21:09:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-20
  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: During the sunrise sort, the package arrived at the hazmat cage with signs of possible internal leakage and you can hear glass moving around. Upon inspection 1 glass bottle of 4 containing "Fisher Scientific Acetonitrile" was found cracked/broken causing the internal leakage. It was then placed into a salvage drum to await further processing and to be sent back to the shipper unless otherwise. DescribePack: The Package failure was due to 1 of the 4 brown glass bottles being cracked/broken and then leaking out completely. The glass bottle seem to have cracked due to being dropped during the loading process. DurationRel: 3 and MitigateEffect: The package was opened immediately and the 1 glass bottle scraps were properly collected to avoid injury's. Then the remaining 3 glass bottles were placed into a salvage drum to await further processing.
